title: Warming Up To Netflix Ads; OpenTable Is OpenTo Ads
description: Netflix Flexes Its Ad Muscles Advertisers who were once lukewarm on Netflix’s ad offering are giving it another look. When Netflix first launched an ad-supported tier in late 2022, buyers were concerned about the limited scale and targeting options – you know…
